name: Intelligence: Dinosaurs
description:
Intelligence: Dinosaurs is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with dinosaurs) in such a way - that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images. The essence of the game as in the old game "Fifteen" (15). The game will have 6 levels with a 3x3 field size, as well as 6 other levels with a 4x4 field size. Each level has a different image.
The game contains images of twelve of the dinosaurs.

Key game features:
- 12 different levels
- Random generation of tiles at the start of the level
- Developing the brain
- Achievements!
